item.title: Roblox: Meme Fruits Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Meme Fruits Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Meme Fruits
  • How to Get More Meme Fruits Codes

Meme Fruits is a One Piece based RPG game with a meme stylization, but has no less enjoyable and interesting gameplay. As in other similar Roblox games, you will need to level up your character to buy different fruits, learn new combat techniques, and defeat enemies.

Meme Fruits will help you speed up this process, as they will be a good source of useful resources and currency, like Cash and Gems. So, if you want to easily replenish your capital, be sure to use the codes.

Updated April 2, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code has been added, offering a temporary XP boost to help speed up progress. Other rewards, such as Cash and Gems, are still available for those looking to stock up. More codes may arrive later, so keeping an eye out is always a good idea. Claiming them while they’re active ensures nothing goes to waste.

All Meme Fruits Codes

Working Meme Fruits Codes

  • BINGUS - Redeem this code to get 2x XP for 30 minutes. (NEW)
  • release2025 - Redeem this code to get 2,000 Cash.
  • gems - Redeem this code to get 100 Gems.
  • scythe - Redeem this code to get 500 Cash.

Expired Meme Fruits Codes

  • UPDATE1 - Redeem this code to get rewards.

Redeeming Meme Fruits codes will bring you a bunch of freebies in seconds, so it's definitely worth it. Of particular note, the rewards you get include Gems, a premium currency that will come in handy for buying new fruits.

How to Redeem Codes for Meme Fruits

To redeem Meme Fruits codes, you just need to follow a few steps and the whole process will take less than a minute. Here's a separate guide with a detailed explanation of the process in this Roblox game if you don't know how it works:

  • Launch Meme Fruits .
  • Pay attention to the lower left corner of the screen. Here, above the Menu button, you'll see several more in a row. Among them, interact with the first one with the gear icon.
  • This will open the Settings menu. Here, scroll to the very bottom to find the redemption section.
  • The redemption section will contain an input field and a white button with a checkmark next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white checkmark button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Meme Fruits Codes

Searching for new Roblox codes will take you a lot of time if you don't know where to look for them or have never done it before. Luckily, all you need to do is to visit and carefully monitor the game's official social media pages, the links to which we have collected below:

  • Official Meme Fruits Roblox group.
  • Official Meme Fruits game page.
  • Official Meme Fruits Discord server.
  • Official Meme Fruits X account.

item.title: Roblox: Ultimate Football Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Football has always been popular in the gaming industry, with many fans enjoying their favorite game on the Roblox platform. The Ultimate Football developers have created a great game in which Roblox players have to try their best to win on the football field. To reward fans who enjoy the game, the developers also release Ultimate Football codes, all of which can be found below.

Updated April 3, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new code is available, adding to the list of rewards you can claim. It grants a boost of Coins, which can be useful for various in-game needs. Several other active codes also offer similar benefits, so checking them all might be worthwhile. If more rewards become available, we will add them to this article. Staying updated ensures you don’t miss out on anything useful.

Just like in many other Roblox games, the developers have added a huge number of codes, but most of them have already expired. Below is a list of all active codes, but they may also expire soon, so hurry up and get the rewards.

Codes Checked on April 2, 2025.

How to Redeem Codes in Ultimate Football

Similar to many Roblox games, the button to redeem codes can be found in the in-game menu. It is quite easy to find, and this is what players need to do:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Ultimate Football .
  2. Next, in the main menu, go to the Store tab.
  3. Go to the Redeem a Code section.
  4. Enter or paste the code in the Insert Code Here field and click on the tick. After that, the reward will be received.

Note that players who have just started playing the game will not be able to redeem codes. They must first spend 3 hours in Park Mode for this option to become available.

item.title: Roblox: Ninja Time Codes (April 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Ninja Time Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Ninja Time
  • How to Get More Ninja Time Codes

Ninja Time is an RPG based on the Naruto anime, which perfectly recreates almost all aspects of this series. Here you will be able to choose your role and play as a ninja, learning new martial arts, techniques, and defeating enemies, bosses, as well as other evil that you will encounter.

As with other Roblox games, Ninja Time has the option of redeeming codes, which you can use to get a lot of free stuff. We've compiled a list of all Ninja Time codes so you can quickly and easily redeem them and get rewards such as Clan tokens, Family tokens, or even Element tokens.

Updated April 3, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A new set of codes has arrived, offering plenty of Clan, Family, and Element tokens to claim. If you need more resources to strengthen your character or unlock new abilities, these rewards can come in handy. Be sure to redeem them while they are still active, as they may not last forever. More updates could bring additional bonuses, so check back regularly.

All Ninja Time Codes

Working Ninja Time Codes

  • Confia! – Redeem this code to get 20 Clan tokens, 12 Family tokens, and 3 Element tokens. (NEW)
  • CONFIABRASIL! – Redeem this code to get 20 Clan tokens, 12 Family tokens, and 3 Element tokens. (NEW)
  • Update0.5! – Redeem this code to get 8 Clan tokens, 5 Family tokens, and 3 Element tokens. (NEW)
  • BossStudios! – Redeem this code to get 8 Clan tokens, 5 Family tokens, and 3 Element tokens. (NEW)
  • FixesAndAFKWorld! – Redeem this code to get 12 Clan tokens, 6 Family tokens, and 6 Element tokens. (NEW)

Expired Ninja Time Codes

  • 85KLIKES - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.
  • 20MVISITS - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.
  • SORRYFORTERRAIN - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.
  • 77KLIKES - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.
  • 150KFAVS - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.
  • 15MVISITS - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.
  • 70KLIKES - Redeem this code to get six Clan tokens, six Family tokens, and six Element tokens.

Redeeming Ninja Time codes requires a few clicks, but in return, you'll get generous rewards that would take you a long time to accumulate manually. So, if you are a beginner or an active player who doesn't mind a nice bonus to your progress, Ninja Time codes are what you need.

How to Redeem Codes for Ninja Time

Redeeming Ninja Time codes will be possible once you create a character and spawn in the world. Then, you will need to open the redemption option and activate the codes to get the rewards in this Roblox experience. Here's a detailed guide with all the steps:

  • Launch Ninja Time .
  • In the main menu, click the Play button to spawn on the server.
  • Here, pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen. There will be a Menu button. Click on it.
  • This will open a menu with a bunch of buttons arranged in two columns. Among them, interact with the last one in the second column, which says Extra Menu.
  • Again, you will open another menu with many options. Here, interact with the Codes button.
  • Once you do, you will open the redemption menu. It will contain an input field and an orange Redeem button below it. Now, in the input field, paste one of the active codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, click on the orange Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see “Success” in the input field and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Ninja Time Codes

All old and new Ninja Time codes can be found on the official game pages. Usually, you can find a special dedicated section with all the available Roblox codes, but developers also often add them to posts or announcements.

  • Official Ninja Time Roblox group.
  • Official Ninja Time Discord server.

item.title: How Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army is Set to Channel SMT 5
item.description:
Raidou Kuzunoha the Fourteenth is back, and with him are a host of upgrades and QoL features in Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army . Catering to both old-time fans and newcomers alike, Atlus' approach to The Soulless Army remaster is already going beyond increased accessibility; a combat overhaul, fast travel, an increase in graphical fidelity, and more are set to make the title a treat, but even more exciting is how it will iterate on its demons. Atlus' World Spotlight on the game has confirmed that the title will go far beyond the near 70 demons in the original to include 120+, with popular designs introduced in SMT5 being some of its standouts.

Demons are a quintessential part of the Shin Megami Tensei series, and its spinoffs are no exception. Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army is set to give its demons even more prominence, however, through both number and ability. Fans of the SMT series will notice how the remaster's roster accommodates even more of the series' legacy with old and new demon designs alike; fan favorites like Jack Frost and Pixie are a given, but those from SMT5 and its Vengeance counterpart like Idun and Hayataro will be accompanying as well. The decision to expand The Soulless Army 's roster is clever on multiple levels, considering just how much the game's progression hinges on Raidou's demon allies, as the detective/Devil Summoner leans on them for both combat and exploration.

Raidou Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army is Set to Be an Upgrade On Multiple Levels

Demons With Many Skillsets

Those who are unfamiliar with the Raidou games might be surprised to see that they utilize real-time combat. The gameplay makes for a pretty considerable difference compared to other Shin Megami Tensei mainstays, but one that works in favor of both Raidou and his demons' battle prowess. The Soulless Army remaster is set to give its combat more nuance through Raidou's moveset, which incorporates both light and heavy attacks and new skills that tie into its MAG drain system, offering up some strategies in how players proceed: focus on light attacks to replenish MAG from enemies or go in with heavy attacks for more damage with less conservation.

Raidou can have demons fight alongside him, but Raidou's detective work makes his demons applicable outside of battle as well. The Soulless Army 's remaster, like the original title, will have Raidou rely on his demons to progress his case through skills like mind-reading outside of battle, while also considering environmental terrain through skills like cool-down, turning impassable water to ice or helping citizens to calm down. Like SMT5: Vengeance where the Nahobino is able to channel a demon's Magatsuhi wavelength, Raidou is able to have his demons go on solo investigations, allowing the player to assume the demon's control for a time. As each demon order has a different skill, the ability to consider which Raidou has recruited is important both in and outside of combat, as focusing on elemental weaknesses is as crucial as any other SMT game.

A Hee-Host of New Demons for Raidou Remastered

With regard to the SMT5 demons that will be featured in The Soulless Army remaster, it looks like some might be exclusive to the game's digital deluxe edition. Based on its trailer, Hayataro and Idun will be recruitable within the remaster's base game, while a "Guest Demon Pack" featured on Atlus' website shows the likes of Fionn mac Cumhaill, Artemis and Zeus (in their most recent SMT5 designs), and Huang Long, who itself was featured as Kohryu in Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon . While it might be a bit of a bummer if they end up being a deluxe exclusive, the addition of 50 new demons in the remaster's base game is substantial nonetheless, showcasing how far the series continues to reach with its exceptional demon designs.

The Soulless Army Draws on the Strengths of a Remaster

The reveal of The Soulless Army 's remaster already has fans praising Atlus for the numerous improvements it will be making over the original. Raidou's multi-faceted skills in battle, including "Devil's Bane" and "Spirit Slash" (powerful attacks that consider enemy openings), are just some of the many iterations that will make its combat and gameplay experience more exciting. The same can be said for the remaster's voice acting and demon fusion/compendium additions, including easier search access for demons and the ability to register multiple of the same demon. Channeling not just SMT5 's popular demon designs but the legacy of the series altogether, The Soulless Army seems set to both upgrade and pay homage to its original experience, which longtime fans and newcomers alike are sure to appreciate.

item.title: EA Sports UFC 5 Update Adds Another New Fighter for April 2025
item.description:
Summary

  • EA Vancouver releases a new update for EA Sports UFC 5 on April 3.
  • Patch 1.21 adds Lightweight fighter Mauricio Ruffy and makes multiple gameplay changes and bug fixes.
  • Downtime for the newest EA Sports UFC 5 update will be 1 hour.

A new update for EA Sports UFC 5 is set to be deployed on April 3 for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S, adding another new fighter to the game's roster while also making a handful of gameplay changes and bug fixes. EA Sports UFC 5 is approaching its second anniversary later this year, but developer EA Vancouver continues to release a steady stream of new content updates for fans to jump into.

While recent rumors suggest EA is in the process of revitalizing its popular boxing video game franchise, Fight Night , industry insiders have also claimed that EA Vancouver is currently developing EA Sports UFC 6 ​​​​​​. If both rumors turn out to be true, it could be a busy few years for fight fans. There's no way to know which title could come first, but considering EA's Fight Night series has reportedly been in and out of development for quite a few years now, there's a strong chance that a new UFC game makes its way into players' hands first. On average, new EA Sports UFC games are released every two to three years, and a recent leak claims the sixth entry is aiming to launch later this year.

EA has once again continued to stay true to its word and will once again be releasing a new update for EA Sports UFC 5 , adding another ranked fighter to the game's roster. While fans initially complained that EA Sports UFC 5 was lacking in terms of ranked fighters, a steady stream of new updates has brought the game to almost 100% parity with the current UFC top ten rankings. The latest fighter to join the game is Mauricio Ruffy, a Lightweight fighter who recently defeated Bobby Green by KO in the opening round. The 28-year-old has already made a name for himself in the UFC, fighting three times under the promotion since his debut in 2024. Now fans will be able to play as the knockout artist in UFC 5.

According to the official patch notes, which can be found further down this article, EA Sports UFC 5 will also be adding new alter egos to the game on April 8, but details on who these alter egos will be for are currently unknown. The change log also details some important gameplay changes and bug fixes, including an issue that was causing TJ Dillashaw’s Signature Forward Lunge and Major Forward Lunge inputs to be swapped. Patch 1.21 also fixes some rare camera issues and crash triggers.

While the popular mixed martial arts title is likely approaching the end of its life cycle, EA Sports UFC 5 received a massive player resurgence recently, thanks to its debut on PlayStation Plus. The title was added to Sony's lucrative subscription service back in March, and new data quickly showed that it had received a 127.3% player count increase after being added to the service. This puts EA Sports UFC 5 as the second most popular game on PS Plus, only being beaten by the critically acclaimed God of War Ragnarok , which was added to the service in January.

EA Sports UFC 5 Update 1.21 Patch Notes

Patch Launch Date/Time and Launch Downtime

  • April 3rd, 2025, at 1 PM ET / Estimated Launch Downtime: 1 Hour

General

  • New fighters
    • Mauricio Ruffy
    • Additional Alter Egos coming April 8th

  • New assorted vanity rewards added
  • “The new gloves are the old gloves”. Active fighters will now be wearing the pre-April 2024 Official UFC gloves

Gameplay

  • Fixed an issue that caused TJ Dillashaw’s Signature Forward Lunge and Major Forward Lunge inputs to be swapped.
  • Fixed a rare animation issue that could occur in TJ Dillashaw’s Signature Lunges.

Bugs

  • Fixed some rare camera issues
  • Fixed some rare crash triggers
